Halucigen let more information into Galvatrons mind.  He showed 
what he was looking at.  He was on Alliance Island with FZ 
standing near him.  "The shields are up...but I do have an idea, 
send a pod, maybe rig it with explosives for extra fun.  Send it to 
the Alliance with a message from a , lets say, pretend bot.  When 
they lower the shields I will try and fly out, while you of course 
cover me.
